titleStmt.title: A briefe discourse of mans transgression [an]d of his rede[mption by Christ, with a particular surueigh of the Romish religion]
titleStmt.author: Clement, Francis.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard F[ield] dwelling in the Blacke Friers, neare Lud[gate],

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: t.p. stained (bracketed information supplied from STC); volume tightly bound, with loss of text. Best copy available for photographing.
